content: introducing the ***circle leaf crochet pattern collection*** a curated bundle of video-supported size-inclusive garments xs 5x plus bonuses built around my circle leaf stitch 1 these patterns look complex but they re a breeze to follow even if you ve never made a garment before ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ special offer alert add any pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ the **circle leaf market bag** is a beautifully practical eco-friendly accessory that combines function with flair crocheted in one seamless piece from the bottom up it begins with a sturdy solid base before flowing into the eye-catching texture of the circle leaf stitch spacious lightweight and durable this bag is perfect for everyday adventures whether you re heading to the market the beach or out and about stylish and sustainable it s the kind of bag you ll reach for again and again this seamless market bag is worked in one piece from the bottom up for a sturdy stylish finish it starts with a solid base then shifts into the flexible textured circle leaf stitch for a bit of stretch a structured top band and built-in handles complete the design with comfort and ease a video tutorial is included with this pattern 2 crochet hook g+/7 4 5mm - or size to meet gauge 3 notions removable stitch markers 4 yarn needle to weave in ends 5 scissors 6 yarn herrschners cottage cotton 7 60% cotton 40% acrylic blend 207yds/100g yardage 375 yds 2 skeins yarn substitutions lion brand made with love 8 60% cotton 40% acrylic 185yds/100g wecrochet shine 9 60% pima cotton 40% modal 75yds/50g wecrochet dishie 10 100% cotton 190yds/100g lily sugar n cream 11 100% cotton 120yds/71g abbreviations chain - treble_crochet ws - wrong side yo - yarn over gauge 17 sts and 12 row = 4 x 4 in half_double_crochet unblocked not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 13 sizes one size 12x14 skill level advanced beginner let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 14 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 15 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 16 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 17 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 18 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 19 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2025 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may
